value.name: Fayetteville man suing city after he says excessive force used during 2019 arrest caused concussion, other injuries
value.description: A Fayetteville man says excessive force was used during his arrest in 2019, causing him to have a concussion and other injuries. Robert Edwards is suing the city

video.name: Fayetteville man suing city after he says excessive force used during 2019 arrest caused concussion, other injuries

value.name: Sutherland’s mother on son’s death: ‘They need jail today’
value.description: The mother of the man who died in January while in custody at the Charleston County jail demanded justice for those responsible for his death. Amy Sutherland joined activist groups outside the Ninth Circuit Solicitor’s Office in downtown Charleston at a protest Wednesday afternoon over the death of 31-year-old Jamal Sutherland.

video.name: Protesters gather outside solicitor’s office, call for charges in Sutherland death

value.name: UPDATE: Hobart man dies after wrecking motorcycle, police say
value.description: James Johnson, 70, was found unresponsive when Park Forest police and firefighters responded about 9:45 p.m. on Western Avenue near Cedar Street in Park Forest police said.

value.name: Two dead after mass shooting at sprawling New Jersey birthday party
value.description: A 30-year-old man and a 25-year-old woman were killed and at least 12 other people were taken to the hospital with injuries, the New Jersey State Police said on social media.

value.name: South Carolina ACLU launches free app that records police-civilian encounters
value.description: The ACLU of South Carolina released a free smartphone application that allows users to record civilian encounters with police and other public officials. Users can report any abuse by authorities

value.name: New Texas law bans reality shows from working with law enforcement after man's 2019 death
value.description: A new law in Texas, signed Wednesday, will prevent reality TV shows from partnering with state law enforcement.

value.name: James Johnson (knee) questionable for Pelicans Sunday
value.description: New Orleans Pelicans forward James Johnson is considered questionable to play Sunday in the team's game against the Los Angeles Lakers.

value.name: S.C. girl dead, 13 injured after shooting at ‘unauthorized concert’
value.description: May 22 after a fight broke out near the stage at an “unannounced and unauthorized concert event within the neighborhood,” Deputy Chief Scott Deckard said. “It was set up like a concert,” he said of the cookout.

value.name: Woodbridge Pain Clinic Manager, Customers Face Opioid Charges
value.description: The manager of a Woodbridge pain clinic forged prescriptions for opioids and then illegally sold them, according to federal prosecutors.

value.name: Girl dead, 14 hit in North Charleston shooting amid concert, fight
value.description: Multiple shooters fired into a crowded concert and cookout in a North Charleston neighborhood late May 22, striking 14 people, including a 14-year-old girl who later died. North Charleston Police Chief Reggie Burgess said the “individuals who were angry with each other didn’t care who got hit.

value.name: Demonstrators march for answers in Taser death of Timmonsville man
value.description: Friends and family of a Timmonsville man who died after being tased during a traffic stop were joined by civil rights activists for a march downtown Friday.

value.name: Search launched for missing 23-year-old man from Southampton
value.description: A SEARCH has been launched for a missing man from Southampton . Police are appealing for help from the public for 23-year-old Angus Tomlin, who was last seen leaving the city's IKEA wshop at 11.45am today (May 22).
